title: RP Card help
body: I bought an RP card today and I went a bit overzealous and scratched the first 6 numbers out, is there anyway to still redeem my card. I know it might be a bit too risky because it is a scratched card but can I redeem/return it in any way still so I don't just waste $10 dollars?

replies.body: Ah, no worries we can look into this and help individually.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team might be able to get the details for that card.  We'll reply back asap!
REALLY!?! woah didn't think this would happen alright thank you!!
